weAre.body: We’re a new and dynamic independent trade union. From our roots representing migrant workers, we’ve evolved to taking on the bosses of the so-called gig economy and government regulators, representing under-unionised and under-represented workforces.

0.title: Organise for change
0.body: Join the IWGB and campaign for long-lasting change in your workplace. The union creates real collective power among workers.

1.title: Workplace protection
1.body: From workplace bullying to illegal deduction of wages, if you are facing problems at work, then contact your union.

2.title: Support us
2.body: Your donations will help the union run campaigns and make sure we can support every member.

donate.title: Our work matters
donate.body: We're just one David and there's a lot of Goliaths out there. As such, we rely on dues and donations to do our work - if you can, we'd really appreciate any contributions to our vital work.
